name: Hat's a Problem
description:
Enter CTRL presents HAT'S A PROBLEM! Press 'HELP!' to learn how to get started!

Hat's a Problem is a bullet hell arcade game with a hint of magic, developed for Mini Jam 41. Play as a magician in a performance gone wrong, and keep the show going! 

This game is planned to go through further development and expansion, so please feel free to post feedback and ideas for the future.

This game is currently broken in HTML, please download it to play until it is fixed. Sorry for the inconvenience!
